text: Immunoassay for <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1>

Concentrations of <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in culture supernatants of <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were measured in duplicate by the quantitative sandwich ELISA using cytokine - specific capture with biotinylated detection mAb and recombinant cytokine proteins ( all from Becton Dickinson ) , according to the manufacturer 's protocol .
The detection limits for <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were 15 pg / ml .
